text: EBO The European Board of Ophthalmology (EBO) is the European professional association for ophthalmology. Founded in London in 1992, it is a specialised agency of the European Union of Medical Specialists (UEMS). EBO aims to harmonise standards and improve the quality of ophthalmology training across Europe. ==Examinations== EBO awards the title Fellow of the European Board of Ophthalmology (FEBO) upon success in a specialist clinical examination. In some European countries this test replaces the national certification examination. ==References== Category:Ophthalmology organizations Category:Medical and health organizations based in Europe
title: European Board of Ophthalmology
